fields.name: Stapler Heavy Duty
fields.description: This heavy-duty stapler is designed for everyday office needs. It can bind up to 50 sheets in one go, making it perfect for both small and large tasks. Built with durable steel, it ensures long-lasting use. Its ergonomic grip reduces strain during repetitive work. Compact size makes it easy to store in drawers or carry. A must-have accessory for every organized workspace.
fields.key_features:
Binds up to 50 sheets
Ergonomic grip handle
Durable steel body
Compact and portable
Jam-resistant mechanism
Refill indicator window

fields.title: Strong and sturdy
fields.content: Staples smoothly without jams. A lifesaver for my reports.

fields.title: Good but heavy
fields.content: Works perfectly but a little heavy to carry around daily.

fields.name: Paper Clips Box
fields.description: Keep your documents neatly organized with this box of paper clips. Rust-resistant and smooth finished, these clips are gentle on paper. The strong grip ensures papers stay secure without slipping. Perfect for office, school, or home organization. Compact box keeps them tidy and portable. Affordable and practical for everyday use.
fields.key_features:
100 clips per box
Rust-resistant finish
Smooth edges to avoid tearing paper
Strong gripping power
Compact and portable box
Multipurpose use

fields.title: Exactly what I needed
fields.content: Simple, cheap, and effective. The box lasts a long time.

fields.title: Not very strong
fields.content: Some clips bend easily if used for too many papers.

fields.name: Desk Organizer Tray
fields.description: A multi-compartment desk organizer tray designed to keep stationery and documents tidy. Its sturdy plastic build makes it lightweight yet durable. Ideal for holding pens, sticky notes, clips, and even small electronics. The modern design fits well in any office setting. Helps reduce clutter and improves efficiency. Easy to clean and maintain for long-term use.
fields.key_features:
Multiple compartments
Durable plastic material
Lightweight and portable
Sleek modern design
Helps reduce desk clutter
Easy to clean

fields.title: Neat desk finally!
fields.content: All my pens and sticky notes are now in one place. Love it.

fields.title: Good value
fields.content: Sturdy and stylish, looks neat on my office table.

fields.name: Office Scissors Set
fields.description: This office scissors set includes two sizes for multipurpose use. Sharp stainless-steel blades cut smoothly through paper, fabric, and plastic. Ergonomic handles provide comfort during prolonged use. Suitable for home, office, and school projects. Lightweight yet durable, these scissors last for years. A safe choice with protective blade covers.
fields.key_features:
Set of 2 sizes
Sharp stainless steel blades
Ergonomic comfort grip
Multipurpose cutting use
Durable lightweight design
Protective blade covers

fields.title: Sharp and smooth
fields.content: Cuts paper like butter, very satisfied with the quality.

fields.title: Nice grip
fields.content: Handles feel comfortable even after long use.

fields.name: Whiteboard Markers Pack
fields.description: High-quality markers that write smoothly and erase cleanly. Includes 6 assorted colors for clear visibility. Low-odor, non-toxic ink safe for classrooms and offices. Long-lasting ink ensures extended use. Markers come with fine tips for precision writing. Easy to erase without leaving stains or residue.
fields.key_features:
Pack of 6 colors
Smooth writing performance
Fine tips for clarity
Low-odor, non-toxic ink
Long-lasting ink
Easy erase without stains

fields.title: Great colors
fields.content: Colors are vibrant and don’t dry quickly. Perfect for office meetings.

fields.title: Erases well
fields.content: Leaves no residue, very clean whiteboard after use.

fields.name: Sticky Notes Pad
fields.description: Keep track of important tasks with these colorful sticky notes. Strong adhesive ensures they stick securely to most surfaces. Easy to remove without leaving residue. Each pad contains 100 sheets in assorted bright colors. Perfect for reminders, study notes, and quick communication. A must-have for students and professionals alike.
fields.key_features:
100 sheets per pad
Bright assorted colors
Strong adhesive
Removes cleanly without residue
Compact and lightweight
Ideal for notes and reminders

fields.title: Handy and bright
fields.content: Keeps my reminders visible on the monitor, love the colors.

fields.title: Good adhesive
fields.content: Sticks well but doesn’t damage paper when removed.

fields.name: Office Tape Dispenser
fields.description: A reliable tape dispenser designed for quick and smooth usage. Weighted base keeps it stable on desks. Sharp metal blade provides effortless cutting. Fits standard office tape rolls easily. Compact design saves space and looks professional. A time-saving accessory for every office desk.
fields.key_features:
Weighted base for stability
Sharp metal blade
Fits standard tape rolls
Durable plastic body
Compact desk design
Time-saving accessory

fields.title: Stable and sharp
fields.content: Cuts cleanly and doesn’t move around while pulling tape.

fields.title: Good design
fields.content: Looks neat and professional on my desk.

fields.name: Punching Machine
fields.description: This punching machine is ideal for preparing documents for filing. Strong metal construction ensures durability. Can punch through up to 20 sheets at once. Compact design makes it easy to use and store. Rubber base prevents slipping during use. A useful addition for any office filing system.
fields.key_features:
Punches 20 sheets at once
Strong metal body
Compact and lightweight
Non-slip rubber base
Easy to use
Durable for long-term use

fields.title: Works well
fields.content: Good punching machine, doesn’t require much force.

fields.title: Average
fields.content: Does the job but feels a bit stiff sometimes.

fields.name: Office Pin Box
fields.description: Organize papers effortlessly with this box of office pins. Made of stainless steel for strength and rust resistance. Sharp tips ensure easy pinning on paper and boards. Comes in a handy plastic box for storage. A staple accessory for schools, offices, and home use. Compact, durable, and affordable.
fields.key_features:
200 pins per box
Stainless steel construction
Rust-resistant material
Sharp tips for easy use
Compact storage box
Durable and reusable

fields.title: Handy box
fields.content: Keeps all pins in one place, sharp and effective.

fields.title: Affordable
fields.content: Very cheap and lasts for months. Excellent quality.
